Sentencas: This study reports on the combination of solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) generators fueled with biogas as renewable energy source, recoverable from wastes but at present underexploited.
Titulo: Biogas as a fuel source for SOFC co-generators

Sentencas: From a mobilisable near-future potential in the European Union (EU-15) of 17 million tonnes oil equivalent (Mice), under 15% appears to be converted today into useful heat and power (2 Mtoe).
Titulo: Biogas as a fuel source for SOFC co-generators

Sentencas: SOFCs could improve and promote the exploitation of biogas on manifold generation sites as small combined heat and power (5-50 kW(el)), especially for farm and sewage installations, raising the electrical conversion efficiency on such reduced and variable power level.
Titulo: Biogas as a fuel source for SOFC co-generators

Sentencas: Larger module packs of the high temperature ceramic converter would also be capable of operating on contaminated fuel of low heating value (less than 40% that of natural gas) which can emanate from landfill sites (MW-size).
Titulo: Biogas as a fuel source for SOFC co-generators

Sentencas: Landfill gas delivers 80% of current world biogas production.
Titulo: Biogas as a fuel source for SOFC co-generators

Sentencas: This document compiles and estimates biogas data on actual production and future potential and presents the thermodynamics of the biogas reforming and electrochemical conversion processes.
Titulo: Biogas as a fuel source for SOFC co-generators

Sentencas: A case study is reported of the energy balance of a small SOFC co-generator operated with agricultural biogas, the largest potential source.
Titulo: Biogas as a fuel source for SOFC co-generators
